summary: get Seller Center notification, the permission is controlled by App type
description: get Seller Center notification, the permission is controlled by App type

query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

query.name: page_size
query.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 30.

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/shop/get_authorised_reseller_brand?access_token=access_token&page_no=1&page_size=10&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'GET',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: is_authorised_reseller
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the shop is authorised reseller.

schema.name: total_count
schema.description: The number of authorised brand linked with the shop.

schema.name: more
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the authorised brand list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of authorised brand.

schema.name: brand_id
schema.description: ID of the authorised brand, it may be the same in different regions.
